title: 'Yaman' opens big on Feb 24
text:
'Yaman' opens big on Feb 24 'Yaman' opens big on Feb 24 Comments Vijay Antonys Yaman will be the biggest release for this Friday (February 24) in Kollywood. 
The film is likely to be released in 350 screens across Tamil Nadu and already Lyca Productions has sold the territory-wise rights to leading distributors in the state. 
Jazz Cinemas has bought the Chennai city rights of Yaman , Udhayanidhi Stalins Red Giant will be distributing the film in Salem, S Pictures will be releasing in North-South Arcot and Trident Arts Ravi will take care of the Chengalpattu distribution. 
Leading financier Anbu of Gopuram Films has bought the Madurai-Ramanathapuram area rights of Yaman , Sakthi has Coimbatore rights and Tirunelveli-Kanyakumari has been bagged by Subbiah. 
Produced by Vijay Antony and Lyca Productions, the film will also have a huge release in Andhra Pradesh/Telangana. Touted to be a political action thriller, Yaman also has Prasanths dad Thyagarajan and Miya George playing key characters.
